statements.delete: DELETE FROM glebeProperty WHERE EleID = #EleID# and SvgUID= #SvgUID#
statements.update:
UPDATE glebeProperty SET
"ParentEleID"= #ParentEleID#
WHERE EleID = #EleID# and SvgUID= #SvgUID#

UPDATE glebeProperty SET
"ParentEleID"= #ParentEleID#
WHERE EleID = #EleID# and SvgUID= #SvgUID#
statements.select: SELECT "UID", "EleID", "UseID", "TypeUID", "Area", "Burthen", "Number", "Remark", "SonUid", "SelSonArea", "SvgUID", "ParentEleID", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7", "ObligateField8", "ObligateField9", "ObligateField10", "ObligateField11" FROM glebeProperty WHERE EleID= #EleID# and SvgUID= #SvgUID#

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, '组合地块' as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11 FROM glebeProperty a WHERE a.ParentEleID = #ParentEleID# and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# and a.LayerID in ($LayerID$) order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, '组合地块' as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11 FROM glebeProperty a WHERE a.ParentEleID = #ParentEleID# and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeName as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, b.ObligateField1 as ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID = #ParentEleID# and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeName as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID !='0' and a.ParentEleID!='' and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# and a.LayerID in ( $LayerID$ ) order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeName as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, b.ObligateField1 as ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID !='0' and a.ParentEleID!='' and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeStyle as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, bak.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b ,glebeProperty bak WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID !='0' and a.ParentEleID!='' and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID# and a.ParentEleID=bak.EleID order by a.UseID

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeStyle as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID ='1' and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID#

SELECT a.UID, a.EleID, a.UseID, b.TypeStyle as "TypeUID", a.Area, a.Burthen, a.Number, a.Remark, a.SonUid, a.SelSonArea, a.SvgUID, a.ParentEleID, a.LayerID, a.ObligateField1, a.ObligateField2, a.ObligateField3, a.ObligateField4, a.ObligateField5, a.ObligateField6, a.ObligateField7, a.ObligateField8, a.ObligateField9, a.ObligateField10, a.ObligateField11 FROM glebeProperty a,glebeType b WHERE a.TypeUID=b.UID and a.ParentEleID !='0' and a.EleID=#EleID# and a.SvgUID= #SvgUID#
